hero.title: Empowering
hero.subtitle: Create a professional website for your Gram Panchayat in minutes. Share schemes, updates, and connect with citizens - all in one platform.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search your Panchayat by name or district...

features.title: Why Choose
features.subtitle: Built specifically for Indian Gram Panchayats with features that matter most for rural governance and citizen engagement.

easyManagement.title: Easy Management
easyManagement.description: Intuitive dashboard for Panchayat Sachivs to manage content, schemes, and updates effortlessly.

quickSetup.title: Quick Setup
quickSetup.description: Get your Panchayat website live in minutes with custom subdomain and ready-to-use templates.

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Track visitor engagement, scheme reach, and citizen interaction with comprehensive analytics.

schemes.title: Government Schemes
schemes.subtitle: Access information about various government welfare schemes

directories.title: Directories
directories.subtitle: Quick access to important information and services

myGov.title: MyGov Connect
myGov.subtitle: Participate in governance and share your ideas with the government

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Register your Gram Panchayat today and create a digital presence that empowers your community and promotes transparent governance.

footer.aboutText: Empowering rural India through digital transformation. Connecting Gram Panchayats with citizens for transparent governance and better service delivery.
footer.address: Ministry of Panchayati Raj, New Delhi
footer.copyright: © 2025 e-GramSeva. All rights reserved. | Designed following UX4G standards
footer.browserInfo: Best viewed in Chrome, Firefox, Safari
